subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Senators think they might have another immigration deal

06/14/07 08:16 AM, EDT
Key Republican and Democratic senators are reaching for a deal to resurrect their stalled immigration compromise by requiring that some $4 billion be spent on border security and workplace enforcement.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Squabbling over pork stalls homeland security debate

06/14/07 08:14 AM, EDT
Warring factions in the House neared the end of a two-day imbroglio over how to handle thousands of requests by lawmakers for home district projects, as Democrats yielded to GOP demands for floor votes on offending "earmarks."
FULL STORY
